original_text:
There will be enough goats' milk for your food,
    for the food of your household
    and maintenance for your girls.
korean_text: 염소의 젖은 넉넉하여 너와 네 집의 음식이 되며 네 여종의 먹을 것이 되느니라

sentences.original_text: There will be enough goats' milk for your food
sentences.korean_translation: 네 양식을 위해 염소 젖이 넉넉할 것이며

sentences.original_text: for the food of your household

sentences.korean_translation: 네 딸들을 위한 부양이 될 것입니다.
